TopicTitle: An epic journey to the mun and back with an SSTO spaceplane [1.0.2] *UPDATE: GOING INTERPLANETARY*

Articles.Content:
So I got this thing into orbit on my 2nd or 3rd try and had still loads of fuel, so I decided to head for the Mun, and got it there in one piece. Well, ok, I reloaded once after a failed landing but who's counting ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**So here we are on the Mun:**

![1.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/1.png)

**Fuel is running low but that will have to do for the trip home.**

![2.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/2.png)

**Accelerating...**

![3.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/3.png)

**And we have liftoff!**

![4.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/4.png)

**Man they really didn't waste any money on excess fuel...**

![5.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/5.png)

**I have a feeling we might be coming in too steep...**

![6.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/6.png)

**Please hold it together**

![7.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/7.png)

**The spaceplane doesn't explode but it spins out of control and I can't get it back.**

![8.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/8.png)

**Sorry guys, it's been an honor flying with you.**

![9.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/9.png)

**Then we hit the ground:**

![11.png](http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o485/dfg26/11.png)

**I declare this a succesfull mission.**

Craft file: [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6AGAxq0JMb5RVBldEhVLXlicWM/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6AGAxq0JMb5RVBldEhVLXlicWM/view?usp=sharing)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T16:28:03Z" title="05/05/2015 04:28  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by dfg26**
  
craft file link

Lol, yup, it's really hard to fall faster than the 40m/s required to destroy a capsule now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Grats on managing the range to Mun!
Really well done, when many says it's impossible to build SSTOs... Can you please provide a download link? I would like to try this beauty.

> 
> Really well done, when many says it's impossible to build SSTOs... Can you please provide a download link? I would like to try this beauty.

Thanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Here's the link:

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6AGAxq0JMb5RVBldEhVLXlicWM/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6AGAxq0JMb5RVBldEhVLXlicWM/view?usp=sharing)

It could probably use a few reaction wheels to make it more maneuverable in space.

Yeah, long range SSTO's are not impossible in 1.0.x KSP. they are just a lot different then they used to be. Nicely done on this craft dfg26. Paving the way for the new generation of SSTO's.

I like the combo of Rapiers and LV-N's on the craft. Keeps it from needing more then one type of fuel. Nicely done there.

After some tweaking I got this to orbit with over 3600m/s left. So I decided to head for Eve.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/rmjY9)

Some stuff exploded on the way down but I still managed to land mostly in one piece. Of course these guys are never getting home but that's beside the point ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
